ComicInfo.Summary:
It’s a sign of the times! In this issue, we spoof Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them, and also mock drones, food trucks, and Trump (sorry). Plus, Spy vs. Spy, Planet Tad, Al Jaffee’s Fold-In, The MAD Strip Club and even more stupidity! So stop protesting and go get it today!
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2023-12-11 23:30:01. [Issue ID 581530]
